title: Not All You Need is Love
description: Victoria tells her granddaughter the story of her first love. Victoria met her first love, Drew, in her freshman year in college in San Diego, California. Drew was very different than her, he was a free soul that wanted to explore the world, while she wanted to become a doctor. She wanted the perfect normal life, while he couldnâ€™t accept the regular path imposed by society. Sometimes not all you need is love.
author: Daniela R. Morassutti
